ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: *Kit nods and looks out over the forest. There was a stream running through it* If ya travel at night, there s not telling what creepies come out and get you,

*Kit nods and looks out over the forest. There was a stream running through it*

"If ya travel at night, there's not telling what creepies come out and get you, so it's best to sleep in a cave or something. Also sleep is good for the digestion as well. If you ate and then travelled, you'd only be able to walk at half the speed you can normally do" *She told him*

When it reaches near sundown we'll have a feed, and get some sleep. Up at the crack o' dawn!" *Kit grins*

From: "Joseph Frey" <jfrey1@...>

Sent: May 19, 2000 12:30:53 AM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


"Fine by me.  Beast mode.  I gotta find the nearest Maximal base and
introduce myself."
